spells.name: Arcane Cannon
spells.description: Your focus becomes a magical cannon that fires on its own.

spells.name: Hostile Juxtaposition, Greater
spells.description: You may target one creature for every four of your caster levels.

spells.name: Walk through Space
spells.description: You can spend a move action to teleport 30 feet or to stand while prone without provoking attacks of opportunity.
